title: We Don't Eat Our Classmates
description: It's the first day of school for Penelope Rex, and she can't wait to meet her classmates. But it's hard to make human friends when they're so darn delicious! That is, until Penelope gets a taste of her own medicine and finds she may not be at the top of the food chain after all. . . .Readers will gobble up this hilarious new story from award-winning author-illustrator Ryan T. Higgins. Publisher: Disney HyperionPublishing Date: June, 2018Hardcover: 48 pagesAge: 4 to 7 years
